addInformation

public boolean addInformation(java.lang.String s)
Not for external use - adds a piece of information.

Parameters:
s - A piece of colon-separated information, e.g. "Monday: sunny"
Returns:
True if the input was well-formed, and added to the forecast; false otherwise.

getInformation

public java.lang.String getInformation(java.lang.String informationNeeded)
Get information about the forecast on the day this object represents

Valid names for the piece of information requested are:

  • Conditions
  • Max Temp
  • Min Temp
  • Wind Direction
  • Wind Speed
  • Visibility
  • Pressure
  • Humidity
  • Sunrise
  • Sunset

For instance:

getInformation("Humidity");

...will return a String representing the Humidity forecast.

Parameters:
informationNeeded - The name of the piece of information desired.
Returns:
The information requested; or null if no match was found.
